name: DIZAST Flexfit Hat L/XL
description:
Here they are folks, the inaugural piece of gear from the friendly folks at DIZAST. These are L/XL for the guys and the large melon (headed) women.
We have a limited number of green and maroon lettering so feel lucky if you get one. Most come with white lettering.
Any Questions or concerns feel free to contact us at DIZAST@hotmail.com
